3 TfOrientationFeedForward::TfOrientationFeedForward(ros::NodeHandle &nh):RosOrientationFeedForwardBase(nh)
4 {
5 }
6 void TfOrientationFeedForward::update(const ros::TimerEvent&)
7 {
8  if(this->enable_)
9  {
10  try{
11  geometry_msgs::TransformStamped trafo=tf_buffer_.lookupTransform( tf::resolve(this->tf_prefix_,this->current_source_frame_),
12  tf::resolve(this->tf_prefix_,this->current_target_frame_),
13  ros::Time(0));
14  Orientation quat;
15  convertMsg(quat,trafo);
16  this->updateOrientation(quat);
17  geometry_msgs::PoseStamped pose;
18  pose.header.frame_id=tf::resolve(this->tf_prefix_,this->ee_frame_id_);
19  Pose forward=this->getPose();
20  convertMsg(pose,forward);
21  this->pose_pub_.publish(pose);
22  }
23  catch(tf2::TransformException &ex) {
24  ROS_WARN("Could NOT find trafo for initial pose lookupfrom %s to %s: %s",
25  this->current_source_frame_.c_str(),
26  this->current_target_frame_.c_str(), ex.what());
27  }
28  catch(std::exception &ex)
29  {
30  ROS_WARN_STREAM(ex.what());
31  throw ex;
32  }
33  }
34 
35 }
36 bool TfOrientationFeedForward::init()
37 {
38  RosOrientationFeedForwardBase::init();
39  ros::NodeHandle nh("~");
40  if(!nh.getParam("current_target_frame",this->current_target_frame_)||!nh.getParam("current_source_frame",this->current_source_frame_))
41  {
42  ROS_WARN("Frames for current orientation contain error!");
43  }
44  try{
45  geometry_msgs::TransformStamped trafo=tf_buffer_.lookupTransform( tf::resolve(this->tf_prefix_,this->current_source_frame_),
46  tf::resolve(this->tf_prefix_,this->current_target_frame_),
47  ros::Time(0));
48  Orientation quat;
49  convertMsg(quat,trafo);
50  this->setInitial(quat);
51  }
52  catch(tf2::TransformException &ex) {
53  ROS_WARN("Could NOT find trafo for initial pose lookupfrom %s to %s: %s",
54  this->current_source_frame_.c_str(),
55  this->current_target_frame_.c_str(), ex.what());
56  }
57 }
